mikeshultz.eth

My name is Mike and I'm a systems and software engineer with over 24 years of experience. Most of my work experience is in software development and devops. I've worked with more platforms, languages, and technologies than I care to enumerate here. Lately I've had a focus on Python and Ethereum with a keen interest in expanding my Rust experience.

Below are some of my active and abandoned projects. Find me on GitHub or reach me at mike@mikeshultz.com

Ethereum Software

py4byte

Library for using 4byte.directory and blind-decoding of transactions and events.

ledger-eth-lib

Library to interface with ledger-app-eth on Ledger hardware wallets.

python-eips

Library to parse Ethereum EIP and ERC documents into useful Python objects.

blocks

For the insane person who wants the blockchain in a relational database(PostgreSQL).

Solidbyte

Development toolkit for creating Ethereum smart contracts.

flake8-vyper

Flake8 wrapper to lint Vyper.

ethereum-pinner

Pins IPFS hashes according to events from a contract.

Incenine

Graphical Ethereum cold storage wallet.

Ethereum Services

eips.exposed

Ethereum improvement proposal explorer.

blocks.lol

An API-first Ethereum block explorer.

onclick.money

An experimental ERC20 token and dapp that pays one token for every click of a button.

scatter.online

Experimental decentralized IPFS pinner service built on Ethereum.

ethsnap

A service to provide daily-snapshots of go-ethereum chaindata directories as a fast sync option.

Ethereum Infrastructure

ansible-geth

Ansible playbooks for setting up go-ethereum nodes.

ethereum-geth-dev

Forked package to quickly create a development chain with go-ethereum using Docker.

Libraries

rawl

Simplistic database abstraction trying to balance the usefulness of an ORM with the lack of constraints and flexibility of raw SQL.

python-nimsp

Python client library for interacting with the National Institute on Money in State Politics API.

End-User Software

dead.pub

Ephemeral permissionless scrach pads to share text.

doto

Web application to use as a touch panel application to keep track of calendar, TODO items, control WeMo devices, and display the weather.

dowhen

A conditional execution system and scheduler. Pretty much a self-hosted IFTTT.

authenticator-backup

A python utility to back up Google Authenticator using a Web cam.

orient

A real time Rust STM32 robot that orients itself north for no reason.

tornado-http-firewall

An HTTP proxy that utilizes ACLs to control access to URIs.

pgstorm

A PostgreSQL load tester with basic tests written in python.

orccollector

Handy OpenTSDB collectors including Sensu data and DarkSky weather data. Useful when paired with a Grafana frontend.

sink

Arch Linux AUR installer for the lazy.

sink

Arch Linux AUR installer for the lazy.

wikionastick

A wiki that runs on, and renders markdown documents from a thumbdrive.

undine

A wrapper for handling multi-archive backups with Borg.

auraio

Communicates important information using the atmospheric lighting of an RGB LED strip connected to a Raspberry Pi.

DodgeBallVR

Proof of Concept DodgeBall VR game for the HTC Vive written with C# in the Unity engine.

pyqual

A python+postgresql database quality assurance app.

xsd2pgsql

Script to create a DB structure from an XML schema document.

Other Services

respond.codes

HTTP service that replies with requested HTTP status codes written in Nim.

whatthediff

Application to track the changes that occur to Web pages.
